page.title: 10Southend:Everyday life
page.content: Most of the children get up during the week at around 7.15 or 7.30am. Nearly all childen arrive at school at 8.30 for the whistle at 8.50. After school,which finishes at 3.15, most children go home and watch television.After this,many go to Guides,Brownies,Scouts or Cubs. A few of the children have music lessons learning such instruments as the piano or the violin.The third year children who were asked mostly seem to go to bed at around 8.30 or even 9.00 in some cases. Some of the children do other things like playing badminton,go to majorettes,gym club or a swimminng club or go horse riding. In general,though,most of the children spend their time watching television in the afternoon and evening.
